name: The HIVE
description: Dance club and bar.

name: The Nest
description: The Nest is a long running night club with a full bar, live music, tarrot reading and courtesans. The Nest location is also avaialble for rental!

name: Vibe House - Fight Club
description: Fight club with betting and prizes, and offers courtesans.

name: Seven Circles
description: (+18) (LGBTQ+) Seven Circles nightclub prides itself on being a friendly and safe space for all walks of life. We feature a full selection of lovely dancers, live music, half priced special drinks, SFW and NSFW services for all your desires. Special additions include an in house photographer and artist! Come join us and sin the night away!

name: Eden Hall Hostess Club
description: Modeled after a traditional hostess clubs, Eden Hall allow our hostess to allow you to relax after a long day, come in for a drink, and some great company.

name: Sinners Nightclub
description: The Sinner‚Äôs Nightclub encourages everyone to find trouble in our little, ‚ÄúSin City.‚Äù From exotic dancers, devilishly handcrafted drinks, appetizers, to perhaps a night with a fallen angel, we promise you won‚Äôt be disappointed~ After all there‚Äôs just a little devil in all of us, right? We promise to provide the ultimate experience for a very small price. Your soul? Please come by for a drink and to mingle, "Hell is empty. All the devils are here."

name: House Catboi
description: We're a community of male-loving-male focused LGBTQ+ gamers serving the gay community of Eorzea both through this Discord community and our venue! Of course everyone is welcome! While we are primarily a community of male-loving-male identifying folks, everyone is welcome to take part in what we have to offer and to join the party!

name: Moonlight Mafia
description: We got just about eveything you need. A good time!

name: The Drunken Moogle
description: Need a place to chill and relax after a long day of grinding? Want a hot supper, or a stiff drink? Look no further than the Drunken Moogle! Food, Drinks, Music, Events, & Much More!

name: The Crypt
description: Come to your eternal rest with us at The Crypt. Drinks, music, and prizes await beyond the cemetery gates!

name: Pickle Barrel
description: Seeking a place to mellow out and just be yourself? Care to talk away with friends while knocking back a few cold ones with company? Perhaps you just want to drink your troubles away? Either way you go about it, you are more than welcome at the Barrel!

name: Memory's End Tactus Anyder
description: SFW Public, NSFW Private Bath House. This Complex was built to cater to all the roleplay needs of the community, and as such, on behalf of staff, consider this your home as much as ours.

name: Memory's End Osculum Anyder
description: NSFW Brothel, Bar, & Lounge. This Complex was built to cater to all the roleplay needs of the community, and as such, on behalf of staff, consider this your home as much as ours.
notices: This venue is currently unscheduled due to changes in staffing, but will be returning to a regarlar schedule soon.

name: Inner Peace
description: Inner Peace is a place to come relax and unwind from a stressful day. Everyone is welcome in our teahouse, and we are always happy to serve the weary. Whether you be a bold adventurer returning from travels or battle, a crafter of fine wares coming to rest after a long day of measuring and making, or a strong-backed gatherer seeking solace after the hard labor of bringing the rest of us what we need to get by you can come find a place to lay down the tools of whatever walk of life you travel and find your...Inner Peace.

name: The Golden Otter
description: A relaxing, safe for work tea house, offering a bit of sanctuary when you need a break. At the Otter, we aim to offer the highest quality teas and treats to our lovely patrons, and always aim to please. The Golden Otter is the product of a young Au'ra's dream to build a community, serving quality refreshments to the community. Raina often walked through the halls of other locations, but always longed to own her own, bringing the recipes her family taught her as a child to the others, hopefully keeping the traditions alive.

name: The Twilight Moon
description: Fae inspired venue with Twilight Moon Quintet live music 3 nights a week! The Twilight Moon is the home of the Twilight Moon Quintet.

name: House of Seoul
description: House of Seoul is a swanky little (SFW) After-hours Jazz Lounge located in the ‚ù§Ô∏è of Shirogane on Faerie. We wanted to bring the world of Jazz and ALL music in general to passerbys. Believe it or not my muse was 'Lo-Fi Jazz Cafe meets Cowboy  Beebop' üòÇ. You'll have to see for yourself üòâ. We also have a cozy cafe area in the main lobby and an Art Studio-esque setup in the loft upstairs. Our recently added services include an On-Site Artist for live portraits! We also have an On-Site fortune teller! So if you're into the mystic arts and curious about what your future has in store then please seek out the mysterious Lady Clea on your next visit. So drop in and share a drink and vibe with wandering minstrels practicing their arts. You bring your Soul and we bring the vibes!

name: The Painted Rose
description: The Painted Rose is an Alice in Wonderland themed brothel! We invite you to celebrate your night and week with us and enjoy a range of fun and wonky little cocktails! Not to mention the wonderful host of company our courtesans may provide for you!

name: Lilting Lilium
description: We are a bar and lounge, allowing connections to various vendors in Eorzea supplying various services. Please come by for a drink and to mingle. Should you have any needs, please see our vendor list for possible fulfillment or reach out to the Madame for recommendations. Services: Bar, Duty Roulette, Tarot Readings, Photography, Housing Decoration, Crafting, Gathering, SFW RP and NSFW RP services, Wedding Reception, Arena, Bards for Hire, Artists for Commission.
notices: Monday and Thursday every week. Saturday every other week.

name: Lyn's Corner
description: Deep in the Goblet there's a little cafe. A small place to gather and relax or a quick visit just for a cup of coffee. My door is open for anyone to visit.

name: Wanderers Wayrest
description: A place for weary travelers to come at the end of their day-to-day journeys and find that oft-desired culmination of rest and relaxation. To fill their stomachs with delicious foods, to find the open and welcoming arms of the denizens within and to rejuvenate their mind, and body with a much needed massage. The Wayrest is an 18+ RP focused establishment, and we are more than happy to have you as a patron and feel privileged to have the chance to serve you.

name: Cozy
description: Cozy offers a quaint library to study and discuss with your fellow Eorzean scholars. Sit with a cup of doman tea while enjoying our live performances, food menu and our friendly staff catering to all your needs.

name: Luxuria
description: Nestled by the trunk and under the boughs of Senna's Pride in Lavender Beds, the Luxuria provides a high class experience for its discerning guests and clientele.  Live music and DJs play within their halls to entertain their guests while their bar serves all manners of drinks from every corner of the twelve.  Hidden away from the eyes of the guard, its escorts provide warm companionship and warmer intimacy to their clients, taking them on wild adventures greater than anything Eorzea has to offer.  Won't you come and find your happiness within?

name: Under the Moonlight
description: Nightclub offering SFW and NSFW RP services, a fully stocked bar, casino with dice, astro slots, death rolling and blackjack, giveaways, nightly raffle, photography and art services.

name: Club Pure
description: In a playful mood? Want to break the rules of modern society? Come have your every wish granted at Club Pure! Pure is a nightclub, bar, lounge, sauna, and casino where you can let loose your inner sinner and embrace the moonlit night with a bevy of some of the most gorgeous flowers, all waiting to be plucked at your disposal.

name: The Anti
description: The Anti is a high-class SFW Roleplay focused Speakeasy & Lounge with quality interactions and libations. Our charming staff and atmosphere will have you entertained deep into the night with a wide selection of activities. Try your luck at one of our raffles, enjoy the melodies from our live bard and musical guests, or just kick back and enjoy the night with our lovely staff, the choice is yours at The Anti.

name: The Solstice Equinox
description: Welcome to The Solstice Equinox! Known first and foremost as a legacy FC "Sol Nova". We have been around since the 2.0 Launch of ARR! Now with our new high end night club that changes its theme according to the seasons. You'll be sure Eorzea is on the watch for! We guarantee you will enjoy your stay with us at The Solstice!  Hope to see you soon and show us that You've Got Sol!

name: A Bookstore
description: Welcome to a bookstore! You appear to have stumbled into a random bookstore, with quiet librarians in a dark, warm cozy setting. Shelves line the wall, littered with books from different ages, varying in genres. Throughout your exploration of the small library, small noises can be heard faintly from beneath the floor but the librarians pay no attention to them. Suspiciously, an old window panel lays near the entrance, almost out of place as the librarians can be caught glancing at them every now and then.

name: Club Babylon
description: Club Babylon started off as an idea to revolutionize the club scene in Eorzea. We took inspiration from the many clubs located in Mists, Lavender Beds, The Goblet, and Shirogane. Club Babylon‚Äôs aim is to create a safe nightlife clubbing experience for everyone regardless of their sexuality.

name: Starspace
description: A Space and sci-fi themed venue featuring live music, drinks and gambling!

name: Cafe Miracles May
description: We are an Ishgardian maid cafe that hopes to bring both lowborn and highborn the warmth and luxury of having their own personal maids and butlers. We do tarot reading and serve food and drinks from all around Coethas as well as other speciality services!

name: Blue Ember
description: Nestled in the cliffs of Shirogane, Blue Ember is a sanctuary from the hustle and bustle of adventuring. Come relax with live music in our downstairs lounge, unwind in the private hot springs, or indulge yourself in our handmade menu offerings.

name: The Lunar Landing
description: We offer a variety of activities including a Full Service Bar, Lounge, Dancing, and Hot Tubs for full relaxation.

name: Red Moon
description: Red Moon is an LGBTQ+ 18+ RP venue that focuses on an immersive, welcoming environment for all to come and enjoy themselves. We've been operating since July 25th, 2020. Our mission at Red Moon is to provide a service to the community - whether it's the Red Moon community itself or the venue-going community as a whole. We want to provide a place for people to come to where they'll feel welcomed, noticed and loved.

name: Full Moon
description: Aether's premier lottery clubhouse offers BIG JACKPOTS every Saturday Night! Are you feeling lucky? Full Moon offers a variety of "fun activities", including those which appeal to the more sinful patron and whether it's a refreshing Mentor Mojito or a playful Bahamut Bellini, Full Moon offers high quality beverages for you to indulge in.

name: Silver Garden
description: The Silver Garden is an open social space for small or large events, or for simply hanging out. RP is welcome, but not required. Feel free to come and chat, or just mingle.

name: Succubares Insomnium
description: Succubares Insomnium is proud and delighted to offer travelers of the dusty road a multitude of entertainment to help you unwind. We feature live bands to get your blood pumping, 3mil. max-bet gambling (with the best odds in Aether!), and a spa with courtesan services available.

name: Love by Snu Snu
description: Come get some love and care with our carefully selected courtesans. We provide a multiple of services including private rooms, massage parlor, lap dances, public wash room and more. Full bar is available with drinks and snacks which our bartender, or court, can serve to you via body shots or during sessions. Full nudity is allowed in lobby.

name: Club Foxbury
description: Looking for a place to pregame before a night of venue crawling?  Looking to test your glamour abilities with themes voted on by patrons in our weekly glam contest?  Looking just to blow off some steam with a good drink and some dancing?  The Foxbury is your place to go as your early evening destination!

name: Wet and Wild Spa Resort
description: Come relax and get wet in our showers beds, sofa hot tubs, baths and more. We have a full menu with fruits and drinks which you can have served to you by our barkeep and hostess (sometimes a court when available). Full nudity is allowed in lobby.

name: Angel's Club
description: Stylish monochrome bar and dance floor with live band, drinks, and gambling.

name: Roses XIV
description: We welcome you to the comforts of botanicals and luxuries at Roses XIV. We aim to provide all that you need and more for an evening at our lounge. Bartenders, dancers, courtesans, entertainment... -and a secretary to help guide you, should you ever feel lost in the flurry of the moment. The bar is accommodating with plentiful seating, curated entrees, and a few secret menus for the wandering eye to find. VIP lofts are available for a special view of the floor and stage, just one of the perks we have to offer to our most loyal guests. We are waiting patiently for you to venture into our garden, won't you stay the night?

name: Sugar Rush
description: Join us for sweet treats, live music and the comfiest experience you'll find!

name: ChocoKisses
description: ‚ô° ‚ô•Ô∏è Maid Cafe ‚ô•Ô∏è ‚ô° offering custom polaroid shots with your personal maid's signature on them, lovely performances from or adorable maids, yummy, high-quality foodies to share, and amazing songs from our bard-san.

name: Waffle House Lounge
description: A SFW cafe and lounge for you to meet new friends and have a relaxing time~ We're here to share our love of waffles, cute desserts and enjoy a good time with our patrons :heart:. Now serving brunch and cocktails.

name: Glass Palace Bar & Grill
description: Glass Palace is a SFW RP Venue, and a place to enjoy good food, drink, and company! We have a delightful variety of steaks for you to choose from and an open stage for performers.

name: Duality
description: Come on in and choose your style for the night! With our upstairs for your modern clubby night! And downstairs for your jazzy and classy night! Upstairs is an open stage. If no one is there, show us what you got!

name: Purgatory
description: Purgatory Bar & Lounge is an [18+][RP][LGBTQ+] place where sinners, saviors, and the unlucky in-between go to have their souls weighed on the scale of judgement. Temptation is all around you, but will you be able to resist?

name: Playboy Mansion
description: Welcome to PBM! The place where all of your appetites will be sated every Wednesday and Saturday night. The Playboy Mansion is a night-club with a fully-stocked bar, casino upstairs, and a host to a number of live twitch-DJ's and bands for your enjoyment. Looking for something more? Our extremely talented and beautiful staff are always available and eager to please! Don't miss out on an unforgettable experience and come join us for our next opening!

name: City Pop Night Club
description: Your one stop location for good vibes and beach parties. We specialize in providing a comfy night club experience that features a live dj with every session. Immerse yourself in the sick underground beats or find solace in the cool oasis of the beach with your friends and loved ones!

name: NeXus
description: Welcome to Nexus, We strive for excellence in customer service. We offer a variety of services and entertaintment ranging from Live Music, Tarot Readings, Talented Sketch's, Geisha's and a Full Service Bar. We hope you enjoy your stay with us and look forward to meeting you! Feel free to contact us for events and all your needs!

name: Suki's Cafe~
description: Suki's cafe, a small and comfy dive bar with a cute plushie room. A comfy place to sit back and relax, enjoy the music and make new friends~

name: Last Stop
description: The last stop of the night before you retire to your slumber; full bar, saunas, an open stage and hint of chaos.

name: Forgotten Sonata
description: Welcome to Forgotten Sonata! With a relaxing atmosphere, wonderful live music, and a fully stocked bar, we look forward to getting to serve and know all our current (and potential) patrons! Feel free to stop by for our photobooth partner, Misty Shores, and nightly raffle for different prizes each night!

name: Night's Rose
description: Welcome to Night's Rose, Dear Customer! We are open on Mondays and Fridays and offer you a calming experience in our Cafe upstairs. But, if that's not your cup of tea, we have a Night Club located downstairs. We offer an delicious drinks served by our lovely bartenders, live music, and occasional performances by the Burgundy Room, VIP services and various types of Courtesans Services. Occasionally we also offer Raffles, Giveaways, and Themed nights with best dressed rewards! Come on over, Dear Customers. We are here to service you!

name: King's Court
description: King's Court offers an environment where everyone is able to have a good time, whether it be dancing to the music played by our wonderful bard, having a chat with our lovely bartender or just to sit back and relax to the scenary!

name: Grimm King's Hollow
description: For a night of upper class taste with fresh food and drinks we invite you to experience all the Grimm King's Hollow has to offer, if your tastes are more of the flesh variety our lovely courtesans will fulfill your desires.

name: Death's Head
description: Death's Head is a Gothic bar/Dance club, catering to vampires, werecats and other such creatures of the night.  Stop on in for curated music and a truly haunting experience.  Drinks, private dances and social time aren't the only vices on the menu...

name: Eden's Corner
description: Eden's Corner is an 18+ RP venue for EDM/Bass boosted beats, gambling and dancing! We've got a bar, live music, photography, tarrot reading, hostess dates, private dances and courtesan sessions! All at a fair price of course. We do events often, so make sure to check us out!

name: The Nix
description: The home of the Nix dance troupe! A chill bar and night club with live music, dancers, gambling, courtesans, glamour contests, and various events throughout the weeks. Every night ends with a one-hour performance from the glamourous Nix troupe.

name: Cafe au ‚ÄòLaina
description: Cafe au 'Laina is a cozy welcoming place where you can always find good food and good company. Featuring a menu focusing on quality comfort food, an atmosphere well suited for relaxing, and a stage open to any and all who have a song to share, whatever you're looking for, Cafe au 'Laina is a wonderful place to connect and unwind.

name: P.F. Berrys
description: Berry is that natural entertainer in your friend group - where no day is the same when you‚Äôre around them. Berry now brings you P.F. Berry‚Äôs ‚Äì an oriental burger bistro! This isn‚Äôt any ordinary bistro however, it‚Äôs a venue you can only explain through having experienced it, and no week is the same.
It‚Äôs very much the same eclectic, random, creative, and humorous personality you‚Äôve come to know from the owner.

So, come and relax on a Friday night with Berry, in a premium burger bar environment, complete with live music, an open stage, trivia, glam contests, and a new weekly talk show hosted by Berry herself with a new and interesting guest every time!

name: Lashels Spa and Lounge
description: 18+ Spa and full service lounge, modeled this after the spas from shows like "From Hell" and "The Alienist". The decorations colors, walls everything as old as I could get them to look. Ran by two lovers, of new age but with old hearts and ideals. We will show as much hospitality and care, to everyone who walks through our door. No judgement here, just a place to relax, have a bite and a drink.

name: The Heavenly Hearth
description: The Heavenly Hearth is a quaint and exclusive Eorzean-style tavern situated in the Far Eastern port city of Kugane. Heavily focused on storytelling and open character RP.

name: The Monochrome Maiden
description: ~Where your desires are neither black nor white~

Come and enjoy all of the pleasantries we have to offer.. Craving a taste of the green fairy? We offer Absinthe, Matcha and many other drinks at our well stocked bar, complimented with alternative rock music at our stage. Entertainment is what you seek instead? We have a skilled casino able to play blackjack and deathroll at a moments notice! But of course, we do offer the more lustrous forms of entertainment with our well trained and screened courts! A solid price for top quality roleplay and some may even take photos of your encounter with them ‚ô• Please feel free to stop by our carrd and get to know us, we all love to make new friends!

name: The Gates
description: The Gates is a small venue originally created by the official Free Company of the Delta Fighter Wing Gaming Community, The Fated, as a side project for fun.  Now a dedicated venue, our staff will do their best to serve your every need and provide the most relaxing experience possible!  Whether you seek casual RP, something a bit more focused, or even just a fun hangout, we do our best to provide!

name: Primal Rib Alehouse & Eatery
description: Fed up with silent venues? Hoping to connect with others but scared to try? Missing out on some Chaos in your life? Say no more and queue up at the PRAE! (Primal Rib Alehouse & Eatery) Our eastern inspired eatery & lounge has a little of something for everyone: BBQ service with delicious meats and treats, a myriad of thematic corners to relax and unwind, hot springs to soak in, and a fun friendly staff waiting to serve!

name: The Wallflower
description: The Wallflower is a quaint and cozy caf√© located on Adamantoise. Come enjoy our commodities and weekly specials found on our discord. Future events in the works!

name: The Snow Bunny Cafe
description: A small cozy cafe tucked away in the Lavender beds. The menu is focused on a variety of tea and pastries to compliment the welcoming atmosphere, and there's an open stage allowing any and all to perform. Stop by for lunch, you wont be disappointed!

name: Bliss Boba Cafe
description: Bliss Boba Cafe is home for avid connoisseurs of pearly delights. Come rest your weary feet at our shop and partake in some delectable drinks, delicate pastries, and soothing music. Our special menu also includes a personalized piece of artwork corresponding with their order for our customers!

name: Club Radiance
description: Club Radiance is a chill and friendly little place for adventurers to dance and chill and vibe with us! We offer drinks, music, bards, horrible jokes, positive vibes  and occasional events meant for some light-hearted fun! Saturday 12am-4am EST is when we're fully active, but everyone is welcome to vibe with us on other days 10pm-4am EST! Come rest your weary souls with us, travelers. ‚ô•

name: Cafe Mi-Lanna
description: Lanna created the Mi-Lanna cafe as a space for friends to meet new people and get away from the daily grind. She wanted a place for everyone to come and relax in a soothing, calm, and safe place either for in-character RP or simply for a chat and maybe some photos!

Lanna's friends describe her as kind, fun, and productive. She's a caring girl who tries her best to make sure everyone around her has everything they need and is having a great time. She's the loving big sister of the group. ‚ô•Ô∏è

Lanna is joined by several friends to welcome you to the group. Some of them are a big ball of energy. üòÜ Take Purr for example, she is passionate and caring and she'll go round the world to make you smile. ‚ô•Ô∏è Mel, she is a soft, gentle, and tall üò≤ Bunn Bunn. She‚Äôll treat you like you are the only one in the room with her. Cerie is simply a sweetheart, will do everything in her power to ensure you have a great time and even go the extra mile to make you smile.

Tuya! She is the perfect chit-chat mate! She'll enjoy spending time with you in a conversation and will keep you hooked. Arhana, is our cute and shy one, but will still give you warmest and happiest welcome you ever seen. Celsius is one of the best MCs I‚Äôve seen in this realm. She has the talent and the power to get you to come to any place and entertain you. Tama is super talented for photography and really enjoys spending time with everyone.
We can't wait to welcome everyone to the Mi-Lanna Caf√© and our loving group. ‚ô•Ô∏è

name: Club ELIZA
description: It's roads were paved in white ‚Äî travertine gradients and basalt luster. The path to its doors? Shimmering cobblestone. Eliza opens itself before you, blinking neon at the far end of the club‚Äôs bar decked in all flavours and colours. Opulent shades of red and gold plaster its walls, complemented by the clink of gil and exchange of chips from gambling masters in round tables. A pleasant sound reaches your ears as the steps of most comely courtesans shuffled shim-shimmying blues, saxophone wailed a harmonic weave to its retro crescendo in your warmest welcome.
Eliza opens its doors to you for a fascinating experience with gambling tables, bartending and courtesan services, and entertainment on every floor.

name: Moodlift Cuddle Corner
description: The Moodlift Cuddle Corner is the late night, ultra-romantic, home of warm and soft things. Like stepping inside a marshmellow. Soft, cozy, sweet.

name: Shenanigans
description: An exciting place come come eat, drink, dance, and/or gamble. Shenanigans is all about having fun however you find it.

name: Brunch at Bella's
description: This establishment is Bella's personal home. Guests are invited to spend their morning and early afternoon at Bella's to meet others, relax, and enjoy a complimentary breakfast. There is no set schedule, but the house is generally open on weekdays between 8am - 2pm CST. Be on the lookout for the Party Finder or join the Discord to get announcements for openings!
notices: This venue is usually open at the below times at the discretion of the owner, it is not a fixed schedule. Please check the discord's announcements channel before visiting. üòâ

name: Gold Star Saloon
description: Gold Star Saloon is an immersive Western RP venue. The saloon offers a variety of gambling games, a full bar with libations and provisions, and events such as raffles and contests.

name: The Hummingbird
description: An Asian-fusion, inspired eastern bath & bar.

name: The Golden Kettle
description: Come relax at the Golden Kettle and enjoy teas from all over Hydaelyn!

name: Catnap Caf√©
description: The Catnap Caf√© is a wonderfully quaint patisserie. Here you can find a cozy couch to relax on while enjoying a daily-rotating selection of pastries and beverages, as well as live music performed on the stage in the basement. The maids are here to serve and will cater to you as you unwind in this comfy and soothing atmosphere.

name: Trionfi
description: Eorzeans look for a solace. Their own little spot in the corner of the world to just get away from it all. Sometimes a regular club just won't do it for them. Some folk need a bit more intimacy. That's what Trionfi is for. With a cozy atmosphere, the jazz lounge and bar is one of the few spaces in Eorzea where one can vent to a stranger, relax a bit and chill out with close friends in a smaller setting.

name: ATTIKA
description: A very warm welcome to the Attika community! ATTIKA is a classy nightclub and lounge where you can find dancing, live music, a mouth-watering selection of beverages, and even more so staff.

name: Mortar and Thistle Pharmacy
description: Visit for medical consultations, be it roleplay or IRL. We can help with a basic diagnosis of issues and offer treatment recommendations to help improve your quality of life.
Check Party Finder on the weekends to see if we're open or message Jack Anders @ Cactuar for appointments.
